notes: This map illustrates a landcover classification over Kalobeyei and Kakuma areas, Turkana Province, Kenya as derived from Landsat-8 multispectral imagery acquired the 08 March 2015 at 30m of pixel resolution. The classification is divided into 5 main classes: Savana and Sparse Vegetation, Sandy and alluvial soils with few vegetation, Baresoils and vegetated areas and riparian. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR - UNOSAT.
